description: From a series of nine etchings, Das Gesicht (The Face), published by Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924; head and shoulders of man in the foreground with smaller figures over his left and right shoulders; eyes, lips, and shirt colored with green ink
inscription: LR of sheet, in pencil: Mit herzlichen Gruessen fuer Weihnachten / 1925. | LLC of sheet, in purple conté pastel pencil: Probedruck 2. | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: (Auf-die Mappe : \"das Gesicht\") Privat-exemplar. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E.155
portfolio: From Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face), Euphorion Verlag, Berlin, 1924
signed: LR in purple conté pastel pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23.
title: Man in Room (Self-Portrait), Plate 1 from Das Gesicht (The Face)
